parties.raw_snippet:
THIS SERVICE AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES (this “Agreement”) between Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit
Income Fund, a Delaware statutory trust (“Client”) and Mellon Investor Services LLC (operating with the service name BNY Mellon Shareowner
Services), a New Jersey limited liability company (“Agent”), is dated as of January 26, 2011.
parties.reasoning: The introductory paragraph explicitly names the two parties to the agreement: the Client and the Agent, including their legal names and forms.
normalized_value: Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund

contract_type.raw_snippet:
SERVICE AGREEMENT
FOR
TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES
contract_type.reasoning: The agreement appoints the Agent to provide transfer agent, registrar, and dividend disbursing services to the Client for fees as detailed in Exhibit B, which is characteristic of a services contract.

notice_period.raw_snippet:
Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial
Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms;
notice_period.reasoning: This clause specifies the advance written notice required to prevent automatic renewal—60 days before the end of the current term.

expiration_date.raw_snippet:
Agent’s appointment hereunder shall commence on the next business day after the later of (i) the date hereof, or (ii) the date
Agent has confirmed that Client’s records have been converted to Agent’s system (the “Effective Date”), and shall continue for three years
thereafter (the “Initial Term”).
expiration_date.reasoning: The agreement defines a term that runs for three years from the Effective Date; no specific calendar date is provided.

renewal_term.raw_snippet:
Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial
Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms;
renewal_term.reasoning: This clause states the contract will automatically renew for successive 3-year periods absent timely notice.
